metadata.title: CVE-2015-3234 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The OpenID module in Drupal 6.x before 6.36 and 7.x before 7.38 allowsremote attackers to log into other users' accounts by leveraging an OpenIDidentity from certain providers, as demonstrated by the Verisign,LiveJournal, and StackExchange providers.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
